p: The Jakarta Provincial Government is aware of the importance of community participation and has clearly stated in their Disaster Management Plan that a recovery process in the aftermath of a disaster event should fully involve affected community members [ 50]. As an example, provide an example of this: during the 2007 flood, the community members in Bukit Duri (one of the most flood-prone suburbs in Jakarta), together with local NGO, optimized their own resources to help with the evacuation process and set up emergency kitchens, and were thus able to feed the affected community members for 4 days [ 127].
